long_description: MSR(R) DromLite(TM) 2-liter hydration bag offers the best of two worlds-rugged construction and ultralight convenience! Tough enough for most outdoor pursuits, 200-denier Cordura(R) nylon shell is 30% lighter than the MSR Dromedary(TM) hyrdation bag. Plus, boil it or freeze it, the polyurethane, food-grade coating inside handles every use. Versatile three-in-one cap lets you fill, drink and pour with ease. A clever addition for 2006, a new handle around the opening makes filling the bag easier than ever. Largest opening is threaded to fit MSR water filters for no-spill pumping. Grommet on one end allows the bag to be hung.
short_description: MSR(R) DromLite(TM) 2-liter hydration bag offers the best of two worlds-rugged construction and ultralight convenience!
